notes:
The population data was sourced from the Central Statistics Organization (CSO) and  should be used in accordance with the "Estimated Population of Afghanistan 2015/16" report prepared by the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan CSO. Age and gender disaggregated estimates are calculated based on proportion of population in each cohort in the 2011/2012 National Risk and Vulnerability Assessment  (NRVA) report.

This is an archived version of population projections. The **current version** can be found on https://data.humdata.org/dataset/afg-est-pop.
